query: Does the discovery of the 29 keV Cyclotron Resonant Scattering Feature in 4U 0352+309 extend previous research on X-ray pulsars and use established methods for spectral analysis?

citation_function_classification.justification: The query asks whether the new finding builds on prior X‑ray pulsar work (Extends) and whether it employs standard spectral analysis techniques (Uses).
